faqs.q: How many calories in a Chipotle chicken bowl without rice?
faqs.a: About 460 kcal, saving ~205 kcal from the rice.

faqs.q: What's the protein in chipotle bowl chicken?
faqs.a: Around 45 g from the grilled chicken and beans.

faqs.q: Are Chipotle bowls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 1500 mg per bowl due to seasonings and beans.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie chipotle bowl chicken?
faqs.a: Opt for no rice, no cheese, extra veggies—drops to ~400 kcal.

faqs.q: Does adding sour cream change calories in chipotle bowl chicken?
faqs.a: Adds ~110 kcal; skip for lighter options.
